data.message: this is horse shit i said three time already this song is just dont give a fuck...........not still dont give a fuck hahahahaha shared by Eminem and not event the right title u dicks i'm ill enough to diss you for no reason

replies.message: Just don't give a fuck back then. It's 17 years later, and he still don't give a fuck. Make sense now?

no coz he has a song called still dont give a fuck form the same album so the play on words dont work bro i get what ur saying but in my eyes this page has just been a dick and fucked up and nice peeps like you try n help them out holes they dig you dig ??
